Name: AMON
About the game: Follow Amon, the God of Air, on his quest to connect a world of puzzling optical illusions using Virtual Reality. Look around, move around and play around with ancient 3D scanned sculptures from museums around the world. Be sure to put your headphones on when putting together the historic pieces, as Amon is built with Binaural Audio to help you solve the puzzles. It will be an epic journey that moves you. Literally.

Meta Description: Looking for information on AMON? Check out the release date (Nov 28, 2017), developer insights from Lykke Studios, and a complete game summary.
